Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Skulletron::

	Skulletron quickly reacts to to brown bot's movement, and does a back flip
to dodge the attack.  Skulletron fired a shot from his Seeker Missile gun
that hit the hologram right in the temple.  The hologram's head went flying
off of its body.  The hologram was still fighting, but was covered in
holographic mech fluid and it was stumbling.  Skulletron put his gun back
and did a flying karate kick that sent the bot flying.  Then he backed up
away from the bot laying helplessly on the ground and fired another seeker
missile at it.  Amazingly, the holographic bot pulled out a ray gun and
fired it at the missile, and the missile blew up in the middle of the room.

	"Your good.  Very good.  Very good at getting me to show off my real
power!" Skulletron said.

	Skulletron went into beast mode and stared at the headless bot.  Then
Skulletron started laughing to what seemed like death.  Then the bot's body
started rolling around on the ground and kicking its legs insanely.  The
bot's head started laughing so hard that it could drive the most funniest
clown insane. 

	The head started speaking while laughing, "That would be sooo funny if, ah
ha ha ha!!!!  It would be funny if someone just decided to self destruct
themselves just because, haaaa ha haaa!!!  Just because someone called them
dumb!  Oh ya, haaaaaaaaaa haaaaaaa haaa ha ha!!!!  That would be like
laying a mine down on his head, just like this sort of!" The bot pulled out
a timed mine and sat it on his body and then on his head.  

	"And then just, aahhhhh haaa!!!  Then blow up"!  BANG!!!!!

Skulletron was knocked back by the blast.  

	"I have the ability to change bot's emotions!  That is my true power!"
